ingredients.item: 75g Waitrose Love Life White, Black & Red Quinoa Seed Mix
400g can black beans, drained and rinsed
4 tbsp Cooksâ€™ Ingredients Thai Sweet Chilli Sauce

instructions.step: Cook the quinoa in boiling water for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain and mix in the beans with the avocado and lettuce.
Mix in the sweet chilli sauce, season and serve.
